official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to add Morro Bay, California, to the priority list of the national estuary program.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to include Morro Bay, California, in the list of areas to be given priority consideration for inclusion in the national estuary program.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to add Morro Bay, California, to the priority list of the national estuary program.
